tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensationalism_headlines (
  headline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  headline_text STRING,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE headlines (headline_id INT PRIMARY KEY, headline_text TEXT, publication_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE keywords (keyword_id INT PRIMARY KEY, keyword_text TEXT);
CREATE TABLE headline_keywords (headline_id INT, keyword_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (headline_id) REFERENCES headlines(headline_id), FOREIGN KEY (keyword_id) REFERENCES keywords(keyword_id));
CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (headline_id INT, sentiment_score FLOAT, sentiment_category TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (headline_id) REFERENCES headlines(headline_id));

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    headline_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    positive_keywords INT,
    negative_keywords INT
);
